channel.title: Music – Stephen Sanchez
channel.description: Recent content in Stephen Sanchez on Music

item.title: Stephen Sanchez - See The Light
item.description:
She was gone before the morning came
Down the fire escape
She ran wild
Ran wild

In my heart a burning flame
I thought it couldn’t change
Her mind and mine

Love was such a scary thing
You didn’t wanna fall
I didn’t want you at all
Now I’m waiting by a cold window
Until the sun has gone

Oh my my
Oh my my my
Now don’t think twice
Hold me up until you see the-
Darkness that I couldn’t find
Lying by your side
Hold me up until you see the light

On words we fumbled in the strangest way
But still we’re losing space
Tongue tied
Tongue tied

And both our shadows spun all round’ the room
Then into one from two
We collide
Collide

Love was such a scary thing
You didn’t wanna fall
I didn’t want you at all
Now I’m waiting by a cold window
Until the sun has gone

Oh my my
Oh my my my
Now don’t think twice
Hold me up until you see the-
Darkness that I couldn’t find
Lying by your side
Hold me up until you see the light

Oh my my
Oh my my my

Oh my my
Oh my my my
Now don’t think twice
Hold me up until you see the-
Darkness that I couldn’t find
Lying by your side
Hold me up until you see the light

Oh my my
Oh my my my

item.title: Stephen Sanchez - Until I Found You

KY: 95057 / KY: 23924

Georgia wrap me up
in all your
I want you in my arms
oh let me hold you
I’ll never
let you go again
Like I did
oh I used to say
I would never
fall in love again
Until
I found her
I said
I would never fall
Unless
it’s you I fall into
I was lost
within the darkness
But then I found her
I found you
Georgia pulled me in
I asked to
Love her once again
you fell I caught you
I’ll never
let you go again

oh I used to say
